title: Marketplace listing types
content_markdown:
On this page
Level: beginner
Select the Marketplace listing type before you begin the development.
Important
Only organizations that have the Marketplace partner status can develop and publish listings. Learn more: [Marketplace partner program](https://marketplace.creatio.com/sites/marketplace/files/2025-04/Marketplace-PP-26FY.pdf).
## AI Agent on Creatio platform​
"AI Agent on Creatio platform" listing type is an intelligent Creatio.ai assistant that performs complex user tasks for a specific business use case. Each agent is purpose-built defined by task complexity, such as making email campaigns, and specialization area, such as service or sales support.
AI Agents let you execute the following actions:
* Interact with users in Creatio.ai chat.
* Make decisions and complete tasks on behalf of the user.
* Automate knowledge-intensive operations within a defined scope.
For example, Creatio platform includes the following agents:
* **Case resolution agent** that solves cases and track case analytics.
* **Sales agent** that automates sales-related actions.
* **Creatio.ai Agent** that solves Creatiowide problems not related to a specific app, etc.
Learn more: [AI Agent list](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2592), [Develop AI Agent](https://academy.creatio.com/docs/8.x/no-code-customization/category/develop-ai-agent) (user documentation).
## Component for Creatio platform​
"Component for Creatio platform" listing type is a modular, reusable, and self-contained functional unit that can be integrated into composable apps or products easily.
Components let you execute the following actions:
* Perform specific business tasks.
* Use extended functionality.
* Interact with other components in the Creatio ecosystem for flexibility and adaptability.
Examples of components for Creatio platform are out-of-the-box Freedom UI components, business process elements, marketing campaign elements.
## Application on Creatio platform​
"Application on Creatio platform" listing type is ready-to-use functionality like sections, pages and business logic configured using components.
**Types** of applications on Creatio platform:
* Apps that extend the functionality of out-of-the-box apps and Creatio products.
* Standalone composable apps developed on the Creatio platform.
Examples of applications on Creatio platform are connectors that are installed into Creatio and extend the base logic.
## Product on Creatio platform​
"Product on Creatio platform" listing type is multiple apps that fulfill a need in a specific industry or cover entire workflows. The products let you execute the following actions:
* Create comprehensive solutions by uniting partner listings and Creatio composable apps, such as [**Customer 360**](https://marketplace.creatio.com/node/26005) and [**Case Management**](https://marketplace.creatio.com/node/26011), without any additional business logic.
* Offer a list of apps useful in a specific area, providing users with more attractive pricing and simplifying the procurement process.
## Integration via Creatio API​
"Integration via Creatio API" listing type is developed for connecting external systems, apps or services to the Creatio platform using only the Creatio API. As a rule, the integration is configured in an external app and no setup is required in Creatio.
Integration via Creatio API ensures seamless interoperability and data exchange between Creatio and other software solutions.
* * *
## See also​
[AI Agent list](https://academy.creatio.com/documents?id=2592) (user documentation)
[Develop AI Agent](https://academy.creatio.com/docs/8.x/no-code-customization/category/develop-ai-agent) (user documentation)
* * *
## Resources​
[Marketplace partner program](https://marketplace.creatio.com/sites/marketplace/files/2025-04/Marketplace-PP-26FY.pdf)
[Marketplace updates](https://academy.creatio.com/docs/8.x/dev/development-for-creatio-marketplace/category/marketplace-updates)
